meanings.sent1: During the predawns, the sky slowly lightens before the sun rises.
meanings.sent2: I love the peaceful stillness of the predawns when the world is quiet.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped happily during the predawns, thinking it was already morning.
meanings.sent4: The predawns whispered secrets to the sleeping earth, preparing it for the day ahead.
meanings.sent5: In the predawns, nature's beauty is revealed in the soft glow of the approaching sun.

meanings.definition: To occur or take place before dawn.
meanings.sent1: The nocturnal animals predawns in the safety of the darkness.
meanings.sent2: Our adventure predawns as we set out on our journey before sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The early riser predawns to catch the first light of the new day.
meanings.sent4: Hope predawns on the horizon, promising a fresh start with each sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of a new day predawns in the hearts of those who wake up early.
